mapper.select: select searchdate, count(*) as CNT from searchdb where keword=#{keyword} and searchdate between TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and TO_DATE(#{endDate},'YYYY-MM-DD') and SEARCHOPTION='R' group by searchdate order by searchdate asc

select rownum, keword, cnt from( select seq, keword, cnt from( select rownum as seq, keword, cnt from( select keword, count(*) as cnt from searchdb where searchdate=TO_DATE(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') and searchdb.SEARCHOPTION=#{option} group by keword order by cnt desc)) where seq >= 1) where rownum <= 10

SELECT
(select count(*) from POSTLIKE where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as likecnt , (select count(*) from POSTBOOKMARK where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as bookmarkcnt , (select count(*) from FOLLOWMAPPING where FWID=#{userId} and USERID=p2.USERID and ISDELETED='N') as followcnt ,
p2.POSTID , p2.USERID , p2.NICKNAME , p2.FOODNAME , p2.CONTENT , p2.CREATEAT , p2.UPDATEAT , p2.ISDELETED , p2.LOOKUP, p2.MAINIMAGE, i.INGREDIENT , i.AMOUNT, m.PROFILEURL FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM post WHERE
USERID=#{myPage} AND
USERID=#{othersPage} AND
ISDELETED = 'N' AND ISBLINDED ='N' AND FOODNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ORDER BY postid ) p) ) p2 JOIN ingredient i ON p2.POSTID = i.POSTID JOIN members m ON p2.USERID = m.USERID

SELECT
(select count(*) from POSTLIKE where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as likecnt , (select count(*) from POSTBOOKMARK where USERID=#{userId} AND POSTID=p2.POSTID AND ISDELETED='N') as bookmarkcnt , (select count(*) from FOLLOWMAPPING where FWID=#{userId} and USERID=p2.USERID and ISDELETED='N') as followcnt ,
p2.POSTID , p2.USERID , p2.NICKNAME , p2.FOODNAME , p2.CONTENT , p2.CREATEAT , p2.UPDATEAT , p2.ISDELETED , p2.LOOKUP, p2.MAINIMAGE, i.INGREDIENT , i.AMOUNT, m.PROFILEURL, h.HASHTAG FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT p.* , ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM post WHERE

ISDELETED = 'N' ORDER BY postid ) p) ) p2 JOIN ingredient i ON p2.POSTID = i.POSTID JOIN members m ON p2.USERID = m.USERID JOIN hashtag h ON p2.POSTID = h.POSTID WHERE h.HASHTAG LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
